publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7823 Charlie Gordon: Castlemilk High School: Daily Record School Sports Team of the Yearâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the members of Castlemilk High School netball team and their coach, Laura McEwen, on achieving the title of Daily Record School Sports Team of the Year; notes that the group of 14 to 16-year-olds won the award for achievements that included winning what is regarded as the prestigious Glasgow Schools Netball Tournament and for their dedication to the sport, including working to recruit their fellow pupils, through presentations to school assemblies and by tutoring classes, in a bid to build a netball legacy in Castlemilk, and wishes every success to the two members of the team who are set to take part on a humanitarian mission to Uganda, where they will be leading local children in a netball tournament.

S3M-7823 Castlemilk High School: Daily Record School Sports Team of the Year (lodged on 28 January 2011) Bill Butler*, Bob Doris*, James Kelly*, Patricia Ferguson*, David Whitton*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7823 Castlemilk High School: Daily Record School Sports Team of the Year (lodged on 28 January 2011) Jackie Baillie*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*
S3M-7823 Castlemilk High School: Daily Record School Sports Team of the Year (lodged on 28 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, John Park*, Pauline McNeill*, Hugh Henry*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-7823 Castlemilk High School: Daily Record School Sports Team of the Year (lodged on 28 January 2011) Trish Godman*
